programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Dr Dee moved to Alaska and started veterinary practice, and now her Animal House is the top animal hospital in the state. Together with her stuff she handles the most extreme cases and treats everyone, from a reindeer to a sled dog. She can reach the Alaskan most remote areas thanks to her pilots license. She believes with all her heart that all animals deserve the best care. Her husband Ken is a great helper, they rescue unwanted and stray dogs and look for a better place for them.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: American reality series following the team at the Villalobos Rescue centre on their quest to rescue and rehome dogs. Founded by Tia Maria Torres, the centre challenges the misconceptions surrounding bully breeds, such as pit bulls, with hopes of eventually rehoming them. Alongside Tia are her team of dog-loving parolees, each tasked with training, rescuing and caring for the animals. Each episode covers the emotional stories of both her employees and their rescue dogs. Will their jobs help them as they transition away from jail or will they struggle alongside the pups to rebuild their reputation?

programme.title: Dogs
programme.desc: Which dog breed is the tallest, which is the smartest, and which has night vision? These and many more canine-related questions are answered in this fun documentary series. Experts reveal everything you need to know about different dog breeds, with an in-depth look into some of the most popular ones, including rottweilers, bulldogs, dalmatians and many more. The show explores traits of different breeds, such as health and behavioral features, and presents interesting facts about each, from historical backgrounds to famous examples from the past.

programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: The Vet Life is an amazing series revolving around three friends, three vets, Diarra Blue, Aubrey Ross, and Mike Lavigne and their everyday lives. These guys became friends back in University, then they worked in Las Vegas and finally moved to Texas and opened a full-service veterinary hospital of their own. The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: The Vet Life is an amazing series revolving around three friends, three vets, Diarra Blue, Aubrey Ross, and Mike Lavigne and their everyday lives. These guys became friends back in University, then they worked in Las Vegas and finally moved to Texas and opened a full-service veterinary hospital of their own. The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Reality series, set in Texas and similar to North Woods Law, that follows daily lives of men and women who are Game Wardens and whose job is to protect deserts, lakes, woods, bayous, coasts and wild animals that live in the second-largest state in the U.S. These people have their plates full as they must deal with poachers, hunters who dont obey the law, smugglers, while they rescue injured wildlife and defend citizens.

programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Dr Dee moved to Alaska and started veterinary practice, and now her Animal House is the top animal hospital in the state. Together with her stuff she handles the most extreme cases and treats everyone, from a reindeer to a sled dog. She can reach the Alaskan most remote areas thanks to her pilots license. She believes with all her heart that all animals deserve the best care. Her husband Ken is a great helper, they rescue unwanted and stray dogs and look for a better place for them.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: American reality series following the team at the Villalobos Rescue centre on their quest to rescue and rehome dogs. Founded by Tia Maria Torres, the centre challenges the misconceptions surrounding bully breeds, such as pit bulls, with hopes of eventually rehoming them. Alongside Tia are her team of dog-loving parolees, each tasked with training, rescuing and caring for the animals. Each episode covers the emotional stories of both her employees and their rescue dogs. Will their jobs help them as they transition away from jail or will they struggle alongside the pups to rebuild their reputation?

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy is a cat behaviorist. He is the person who resolves conflicts or behavioral issues between the owners and their cats or even between the cats and other pets. These are attacks and misbehavior, and Jackson is a true cat-lover and a believer that any problem can be solved thanks to love, patience and proper handling. Taking good care of cats is a demanding process and a whole science, but in return you will get a loving and purring family member.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Compelling documentary series that follows four groups of ordinary people who travel into the wilderness of Alaska, where they must find a new home and deal with all the threats in this inhospitable and harsh environment. Watch the four teams as they arrive in the Alaskan wilderness and tackle extreme cold, hunger, dangerous animals and blizzards, in an attempt to survive. Using stunning aerial photography and sweeping panoramas, this incredible series will show the audience mesmerizing but dangerous beauty of Americas last frontier.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: Alaskan Bush People is an American docudrama-style reality TV series revolving around the Brown family, members of which are trying to survive in the wilderness, far away from the society. Take a journey deep into Alaskas bush, where naturalist and adventurer Billy Brown, along with his wife, Ami, and their seven children, choose to live life on their own terms, connected to wild nature and bonded to each other.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Reality series, set in Texas and similar to North Woods Law, that follows daily lives of men and women who are Game Wardens and whose job is to protect deserts, lakes, woods, bayous, coasts and wild animals that live in the second-largest state in the U.S. These people have their plates full as they must deal with poachers, hunters who dont obey the law, smugglers, while they rescue injured wildlife and defend citizens.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Natures great predators are animals you dont want to come across, especially when you find yourself in their own backyard. In this heart-pumping documentary series, individuals share their stories of encounters with dangerous animals, reliving the frightful, life-threatening ordeal. With stories from across the world, we reveal the heart-in-mouth moments when these lucky individuals managed to escape the jaws of death. From a swimmer mauled by a bull shark in the Bahamas to a close shave with a grizzly bear in the mountains, these stories showcase the fearsome power of predators.

programme.title: Life at Vet University
programme.desc: Documentary series following six students at the University of Pennsylvania School of Veterinary Medicine, as they prepare to complete their gruelling four-year education at one of the most prestigious veterinarian colleges in the world. Known as Penn Vet, the institute is recognised as one of the most distinguished schools in animal research and care, and the course requires the students full devotion if they wish to graduate as veterinarians. Watch the students as they meander their perpetual studies and put their learning into practice, growing both as people and professionals during the intense, consuming course.

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing the World
programme.desc: BBC-produced factual drama starring Daniel Radcliffe and Bill Paxton, telling the story of the battle behind the hit video game Grand Theft Auto. In autumn 2013, the games latest iteration - GTA: V - earned $1bn in just three days, becoming the fastest-selling entertainment product in history. This drama goes back to 2002, to tell the story of a three-year period of intense controversy in the history of this iconic games development. It happened when two passionate men on either side of a high-stakes cultural divide clashed. This conflict, between the creative genius behind the game and a self-styled crusader for American morality, escalated into a fight for the hearts, minds and freedoms of an entire gaming generation.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

The series highlights their daily routine, their duties at work and at home, their families and pets.

programme.desc: BBC News remembers some of those who have left us this year.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Nobel Minds
programme.desc: The winners of this years Nobel prizes in medicine and physics discuss their work.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Focus on Africa
programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. The program includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

The Interview presents top personalities from culture, important political figures, representatives of diplomacy, economic experts, and other professionals in various spheres.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Focus on Africa
programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. The program includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

programme.title: Никонов и Ко
programme.desc: В результате перестрелки 38-летний оперативный работник следственного отдела МВД Сергий Никонов получает тяжелейшую травму позвоночника. У Сергея парализованы ноги, он может передвигаться лишь в инвалидном кресле. Чтобы отвлечься от своей личной трагедии и справиться с депрессией, Сергей организовывает у себя в квартире неофициальный отдел по расследованию криминальных преступлений.

programme.title: Никонов и Ко

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. programme.title: Контакт
programme.desc: Спецслужбы проводят взрывные работы на участке, где зафиксированы магнитные аномалии. Совершенно случайно в зоне взрыва оказываются три человека: преступник Владимир Голенко, фотохудожник Олег Малинин и неудачливый писатель Венедикт Тартаковский. В результате взрыва между этими людьми возникает странная связь – фотограф Малинин может читать мысли преступника Голенко, и даже видеть окружающий мир его глазами, а писатель Тартаковский может полностью управлять действиями Голенко и при этом общаться с Малининым на расстоянии. Тартаковский, получив в свое полное распоряжение преступника Голенко, решает его руками отомстить всем, кто мешал ему в жизни. Город захлестывает череда кровавых преступлений...

programme.title: Контакт
programme.desc: Голенко убивает Катю. Малинин в отчаянии. Бражник не верит в видения Малинина и считает его сообщником убийцы, тем более, что в квартире Кати найдены его отпечатки пальцев. Малинина объявляют в розыск. Он скрывается на даче Кати. Тартаковский тем временем задумывает новое убийство - на этот раз, жертва - Татьяна, девушка, которая его отвергла. Малинин снова это "видит". Он пытается самостоятельно найти Голенко, через Васильченко, адрес которого он "подсмотрел", когда Голенко с ним встречался. Но Васильченко подозревает в Малинине полицейского. Он бьет его по голове, приковывает наручниками к батарее и сбегает. Голенко, который в этот момент, уже готов убить Татьяну, неожиданно теряет сознание. Тартаковский озабочен, что произошло с его марионеткой? Малинин удается выбраться из квартиры Васильченко. Он приходит к Николаевой и все ей рассказывает.

programme.title: Контакт
programme.desc: Спецслужбы проводят взрывные работы на участке, где зафиксированы магнитные аномалии. Совершенно случайно в зоне взрыва оказываются три человека: преступник Владимир Голенко, фотохудожник Олег Малинин и неудачливый писатель Венедикт Тартаковский. В результате взрыва между этими людьми возникает странная связь – фотограф Малинин может читать мысли преступника Голенко, и даже видеть окружающий мир его глазами, а писатель Тартаковский может полностью управлять действиями Голенко и при этом общаться с Малининым на расстоянии. Тартаковский, получив в свое полное распоряжение преступника Голенко, решает его руками отомстить всем, кто мешал ему в жизни. Город захлестывает череда кровавых преступлений...

programme.title: Контакт

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Никонов и Ко
programme.desc: В результате перестрелки 38-летний оперативный работник следственного отдела МВД Сергий Никонов получает тяжелейшую травму позвоночника. У Сергея парализованы ноги, он может передвигаться лишь в инвалидном кресле. Чтобы отвлечься от своей личной трагедии и справиться с депрессией, Сергей организовывает у себя в квартире неофициальный отдел по расследованию криминальных преступлений.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: День святого Валентина оказывается одним из самых напряжённых — происходят многочисленные случаи суицида и захвата заложников. Новичок Раф временно заменяет Ворди, и Группе Один приходится разделиться. Вдовой борется с мыслями о самоубийстве, рассерженная мать удерживает в заложниках менеджера своей дочери, работающей в стрип-клубе, а одержимый стрелок испытывает навязчивую любовь к своему начальнику. К тому же последняя пострадавшая проявляет романтический интерес к Грегу.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Спайку приходится оставить умирающего отца, чтобы помочь Группе Один обезвредить бомбу. Однако оказывается, что заложено сразу две взрывные устройства, которые сработают одновременно. Спайк, Раф, Сэм и шесть мирных жителей оказываются в ловушке. Позже Спайк находит сложное химическое устройство, способное разрушить всё здание. Виновником оказывается один из заложников — он решил отомстить компании, которая несправедливо обвинила его в передаче секретов конкурентам.

Совершенно случайно в зоне взрыва оказываются три человека: преступник Владимир Голенко, фотохудожник Олег Малинин и неудачливый писатель Венедикт Тартаковский. В результате взрыва между этими людьми возникает странная связь – фотограф Малинин может читать мысли преступника Голенко, и даже видеть окружающий мир его глазами, а писатель Тартаковский может полностью управлять действиями Голенко и при этом общаться с Малининым на расстоянии. Тартаковский, получив в свое полное распоряжение преступника Голенко, решает его руками отомстить всем, кто мешал ему в жизни. Город захлестывает череда кровавых преступлений...

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. programme.title: Горячая точка

Чтобы доказать свою значимость и вернуть уважение семьи, Райан пытается самоутвердиться, но безуспешно, из-за чего задумывается о самоубийстве. Вдохновлённый борьбой Райана, Паркер набирается мужества и звонит женщине, которая ему нравится.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin start noticing small details around Elmore High that dont add up. They come to the conclusion that Molly has disappeared, even though nobody else remembers her ever having existed. programme.desc: Clayton is a compulsive liar, but Gumball discovers he wasnt lying about his awesome martial arts move. Gumball confronts Clayton about his fabled Seven Pressure Point Heart Exploding Technique, assuming its another one of his outlandish claims. programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are shocked to realise that their class isnt the only one in Elmore Junior High. / Dad discovers that Granny Jojo and Louie plan to get married and move to Florida. To stop this happening he adopts Louie so that he can forbid him from marrying Granny Jojo. / After they receive an extravagant invitation to Masamis birthday party Gumball and Darwin are anxious to find just the right gift for her. However theyre not the only ones. / Gumball sets out to prove to Pennys father that hes good enough for his daughter. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Dad discovers that Granny Jojo and Louie plan to get married and move to Florida. To stop this happening he adopts Louie so that he can forbid him from marrying Granny Jojo. / After they receive an extravagant invitation to Masamis birthday party, Gumball and Darwin are anxious to find just the right gift for her. / Gumball decides that the best way to prove to Mr. Fitzgerald that hes good enough for Penny is to become his apprentice for the day.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: Lana is on a crucial quest to transport an ice sculpture of Admiral Lovejoy to a celebration for her in Weymouth, when the figurehead of the Mighty Windbreaker breaks off and is lost at sea. Unfortunately for Lana, this triggers Andar and the crews superstitious phobia of sailing without a figurehead, putting Lanas quest and the Mighty Windbreaker in great peril.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: With Andars frustration growing after a series of failed quests, Lana hatches a plan to stage a sure-fire victory for the Mighty Windbreaker. Little does she know, her fake mission will inadvertently awaken zombie skeletons, turning her ruse into a dangerous reality.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: Sometimes we cant help but show our animal instincts. Thats especially true for these three adoptive brother bears, Grizzly, Panda and Ice Bear, who are trying their best to become part of normal society. Whether that means buying food, making human friends or attempting to become sensational online superstars, fitting in with the trendy San Francisco crowd can be bear-y challenging! Despite this, they all have each others back and muddle through, for example forming a bear stack as means of getting around!

programme.desc: When the Bears realize whatever they build with snow comes to life they decide to build the biggest snow party of all time. / Panda gets kidnapped by a pair of deranged French foxes. / Baby geniuses want Ice Bear to attend their prestigious school, but without Grizz and Panda. / The Bears join forces with Unica, the ultimate forest protector. Actors: Connor Andrade, Max Mitchell, Amari Mccoy, . Director: Manny Hernandez,.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: With high school over and one last summer to live it up, Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred decide to travel during what could be their last summer break together. The gang hits the road in the Mystery Machine. chasing fun and adventure. However, havoc-wreaking monsters have a way of finding Scooby and the gang, preventing them from completing their journey. Will they be able to solve this summers mysteries and phenomena?

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. Craig builds a "snowme" and convinces Kelsey and JP to do the same - this results in some interesting new houses as Bobby joins in the fun, but they soon decide that they need to get jobs to maintain their new lifestyles. Feeling that they are overworked, they decide to fight back against their "boss" - an inflatable clown - but then into more trouble...

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. Craig is on his own when he discovers an abandoned playhouse in the middle of a frozen lake and ends up running into his rival Wildernessa - the pair end up bickering and arguing over their differing views when they are left stranded after the lake ice breaks, but a huddle in the playhouse to escape the cold proves to be highly beneficial for the duo.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. After spending a day in the cold, the Stump Kids return to Craigs house to warm themselves up - they are promised grilled cheese sandwiches but have to wait before they are ready, so they decide to find things to do in the house while they do so like drinking hot cocoa, playing video games, and taking part in a game of hide and seek.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. Elder Con comes to the Creek and the Stump Kids are excited - Craig befriends a fellow fan but ends up in a trivia battle with her over a cup, Kelsey sets up a booth and tries to sell her book but has trouble getting any customers, and JP tries to get into a screening room but encounters obstacles - when he finally enters, he discovers something unusual...

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. When JP accidentally destroys a jersey of his, his father sends him a new one from Canada that is blue instead of orange - a couple of hockey kids take to his new look and recruit him into their group, but when he learns that the recruitment is permanent, Craig, Kelsey and Bobby must quickly learn to play on the ice in order to free JP from his obligation.

With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!

With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.desc: Gumball and Penny must stay together all day to prove their bond, defying Mr. Smalls astrological prediction.

programme.desc: Darwin wants to get back a love letter he wrote to Carrie before she sees it.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin use Mollys time-halting power (because shes so boring) to avoid an after school beatdown by Tina.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Nicole wants a new family portrait where everyones entire face is in the photo and theyre all smiling.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin must stop an evil social media app from turning every kid in Elmore into mindless internet-trend-following drone.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: When Anais enlists her dads help with her science project, Richards GUT becomes its own brilliant thinking entity, separate from the original Richard we all know, and Anais must choose between the two.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Colossus: Gumball and Darwin learn that it isnt wise to upset Hector Elmores resident Giant. / The Knights: Gumball and Tobias compete for Pennys affection by putting on the lamest duel in history. / The Remote: The Wattersons battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty. / The Fridge: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner. / Gumball seeks justice when Banana Joe chews Darwins pen. / Gumball is determined to drive Penny away from Leslie / Darwin develops a texting addiction when he and Gumball get their first cell phone. / Richard gets a job as a pizza delivery man which worries Nicole when at the same time strange things begin to occur around the neighbourhood. / Gumball Darwin and Anais search for the Watterson family treasure.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Mom has forced Dad to install a password on the computer. The pop-up clue advises them that the password is the name of Dads favorite child. After trying "Gumball" and "Darwin" unsuccessfully, they discover the answer is, in fact, "Anais". They are determined to become Dads favourites by any means necessary, even if it means undermining each other, plotting against Anais or driving a wedge between mom and dad.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball receives a scare-email from a freaky ghost and decides to ignore it, despite Darwins advice. / Vice Principal Brown gives Gumball and Darwin the ancient school hamster, Chris Morris, to look after for the weekend. / When Darwin and Gumball reveal how theyd spend their perfect day, Gumball confesses that he would spend it with Penny. / Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isnt happy about it.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Turns out constant, relentless failure can put a strain on a relationship. Specs and Skinny are no exception, and when yet another chase ends in embarrassment, misfortune, and physical injury, the Docs finally fall prey to "irreconcilable differences". For a shapechanger, Lamput sure doesnt like change; its like mum and dad are fighting. Lamput sets about trying to help the Docs patch things up. When conventional methods fail, our orange buddy is forced to subvert the very fundamentals of animated storytelling. Lamputs perseverance finally pays off. The Docs have an epiphany: this blob trying to fix our friendship? Obviously thats the real enemy.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons run over Santa Claus and must save Christmas. / Gumball and Darwin receive an heirloom from Richard but lose it. / Bobert loses a bet to Gumball so has to obey him for 24 hours. / Gumball asks Idaho to teach his family to live a simpler life. / Gumball teaches Darwin a lesson after Darwin leaves him. / Granny JoJos overprotective behavior puts the Wattersons in danger. / Gumball thinks Teri is way too scared of germs. / Gumball and Darwin rent a film called A Ponys Tail to watch with Anais but keep getting distracted on their way home. / Gumball destroys Alan and Carmens relationship and has to reunite them.

programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Knights: Gumball and Tobias compete for Pennys affection by putting on the lamest duel in history. / The Remote: The Wattersons battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty. / The Fridge: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner. / Gumball seeks justice when Banana Joe chews Darwins pen. / Gumball is determined to drive Penny away from Leslie / Darwin develops a texting addiction when he and Gumball get their first cell phone.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin see an advert for the latest, cutting-edge Bobert operating system and excitedly talk Bobert into downloading it. At first it seems like a massive improvement, but the many flaws in the new operating system become increasingly apparent. After the upgraded Bobert malfunctions one too many times, the kids decide to reinstall his old operating system. But will they be able to downgrade from the upgrade and get their old friend back?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: "When Alan ditches Gumball to do something more fun Gumball is desperate to track him down and make him pay for his betrayal. Gumball has through gritted teeth prepared a special dinner for Alan to apologise for the way he has treated him in the past. When Alan cancels he is overjoyed until a post on Elmore Plus reveals Alan lied about his Mom being sick and is having a day of fun with his family instead. Gumball tracks down the traitor to give him a piece of his mind but when he finds out his Mom really is sick he has to find a way to make it up to him.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Feeling unappreciated by her family, Nicole strikes up a friendship with a sympathetic AI. As their relationship intensifies, the AI tries to drive a wedge between Nicole and the other Wattersons.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball must find a way to save his relationship with Darwin after the boys are forced to live in separate rooms.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry... / The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.desc: Gumball wants to get Richard on the cheerleading team in order to end their familys generational trauma.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Penny must stay together all day to prove their bond, defying Mr. Smalls astrological prediction.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs go out en masse to catch Lamput, there is a mishap with a bucket of grey paint, and no-one notices the extra Doc on the van-ride back to the Lab. Lamput-in-disguise is overwhelmed by the scale of the Labs operations - but soon enough proves to be pretty sharp at this Doc business. To catch a Lamput, youve gotta think like a Lamput, see. Lamputs so good at science-ing that soon enough poor old Specs and Skinny are sacked with extreme prejudice. Lamput cant stand watching his old buddies kicked out on the street. If only folks would believe the newest Doc: under this grey exterior, there beats a heart as orange as orange can be.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: When Lana abandons the crew mid-quest to go on a personal quest to complete her collection of Flap Shack collectibles, Lana finds herself at the centre of a deadly trap while the crew of the Mighty Windbreaker struggle without her during an active volcano evacuation.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: When Lana is left tongue-tied after verbally sparring with her fellow questers, she goes to Chopov to learn the epic art of roasting in an effort to be cool, only to insult half the Guild, and even her own crew.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: When the crew grow tired of Dr. Chopovs snerk soup, they stop to stock up on croconuts, but Lana gets enticed by a plant that promises to taste like all your birthdays, only for Boreas to have a very strange reaction to it.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: After a month of questing, Lana looks forward to a Guild VIP Pass. But upon their return to the Guild, she discovers that she failed to fully declare their heroics. With no completed missions, Admiral Lovejoy is about to expel the crew unless Lana can race against the clock to complete a quest, which Horatius connives to sabotage.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are shocked to realise that their class isnt the only one in Elmore Junior High. / Dad discovers that Granny Jojo and Louie plan to get married and move to Florida. To stop this happening he adopts Louie so that he can forbid him from marrying Granny Jojo. / After they receive an extravagant invitation to Masamis birthday party Gumball and Darwin are anxious to find just the right gift for her. However theyre not the only ones. / Gumball sets out to prove to Pennys father that hes good enough for his daughter. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Dad discovers that Granny Jojo and Louie plan to get married and move to Florida. To stop this happening he adopts Louie so that he can forbid him from marrying Granny Jojo. / After they receive an extravagant invitation to Masamis birthday party, Gumball and Darwin are anxious to find just the right gift for her. / Gumball decides that the best way to prove to Mr. Fitzgerald that hes good enough for Penny is to become his apprentice for the day.

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: Babs is drawn into the world of modeling by animal calendar photographer, Elmyra Duff, while Plucky grapples with a bad caricature.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball must face his demons and overcome an embarrassing incident from his past if he wants to finally summit the dreaded rock-climbing wall in gym class.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin attempt to make a big impression at the coolest party of the year with the most praise-worthy entrance the world has ever seen.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Anais starts aging prematurely due to the stress and pressure of looking out for the rest of her stupid family.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: Lana is excited to show her dad her new boomerang, when Andar surprises her with a mini version of his awe-inspiring hammer. As hammer and boomerang clash (metaphorically!) Lana and Andars differing perspectives nearly get them devoured by the Arachno Queen, until Lana shows her dad she does want to follow in his footsteps, but in her own way.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: When the crew dock at the Guild for a ship inspection, Lana and Boreas are in charge of keeping the Mighty Windbreaker pristine while the crew go ashore for various errands. The two kids try to spruce up the boat, only to leave it a wreck in a series of mishaps and cons by Trash Imp. Now Lana and Bo must race around Weymouth to repair the Windbreaker before Andar and crew return with Admiral Lovejoy.

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: In this two-part winter episode, Buster is a lucky bunny…until he isnt. When his luck runs out, it puts Acme Loo at risk of closing. With pirates, danger, and lots of snow, the toons embark on a wild adventure to save their beloved school.

programme.desc: Feeling unappreciated by her family, Nicole strikes up a friendship with a sympathetic AI. As their relationship intensifies, the AI tries to drive a wedge between Nicole and the other Wattersons.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball must find a way to save his relationship with Darwin after the boys are forced to live in separate rooms.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs go out en masse to catch Lamput, there is a mishap with a bucket of grey paint, and no-one notices the extra Doc on the van-ride back to the Lab. Lamput-in-disguise is overwhelmed by the scale of the Labs operations - but soon enough proves to be pretty sharp at this Doc business. To catch a Lamput, youve gotta think like a Lamput, see. Lamputs so good at science-ing that soon enough poor old Specs and Skinny are sacked with extreme prejudice. Lamput cant stand watching his old buddies kicked out on the street. If only folks would believe the newest Doc: under this grey exterior, there beats a heart as orange as orange can be.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin try to get a game back from Tobias but Darwin starts to feel like a sidekick to Gumball and refuses to follow his orders. / Richard overhears Gumball and Darwin making fun of him which hurts his feelings and he has to regain his reputation as a hero. / Gumball tries to look good in the school photo. / Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of a trash can war between Richard and Mr. Robinson. / Gumball and Darwin cheat on their maths test get detention and have to escape. / Nicole gets upset with the family at the supermarket when her kids want chocolate but she says no. / The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons run over Santa Claus and must save Christmas. / Gumball and Darwin receive an heirloom from Richard but lose it. / Bobert loses a bet to Gumball so has to obey him for 24 hours. / Gumball asks Idaho to teach his family to live a simpler life. / Gumball teaches Darwin a lesson after Darwin leaves him. / Granny JoJos overprotective behavior puts the Wattersons in danger. / Gumball thinks Teri is way too scared of germs. / Gumball and Darwin rent a film called A Ponys Tail to watch with Anais but keep getting distracted on their way home. / Gumball destroys Alan and Carmens relationship and has to reunite them.

programme.title: All There Is With Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Documentary filmmaker Ken Burns has been called "Americas biographer," but in this moving conversation, he reveals how his own history has been shaped by early loss - the death of his mother Lyla when Ken was eleven years old.

programme.title: CNN Marketplace Europe
programme.desc: Web Summit has become the must-attend conference in Europe for the tech world. For founders, investors, policymakers and startups, it provides a front-row seat for the tech debates that will shape our future. Europe continues to lag behind when it comes to unicorns - while the U.S. has around 800 startups valued at over $1billion, Europe has just over 200 - but that number has been growing with the AI boom, so we sat down with some of those leading lights in the continents tech scene.

programme.title: Walk of Art
programme.desc: We explore how art has influenced the cultural landscape of Qatar and how it can be an immersive experience for those who visit, live and work there. We meet designers and artists who reflect the countrys layers of creativity, cultural diversity and modern identity. They guide us through Dohas open-air gallery, taking us to the public artwork that inspires them the most and represents a milestone in Qatars artistic evolution. From Doha Mountains and Cesars Pouce to remembering Qatars pearl diving heritage and the first artistic landmark - the Museum of Islamic Art.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: The Whole Story with Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Nick Paton Walsh reports on the impact of the internet being introduced to the Amazon jungles indigenous Kanamari community for the first time and how its people grapple with a technology that has transformed every part of Western life.

programme.title: The Whole Story with Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Bill Weir speaks with the biggest stars working to revolutionize the environmental impact of live music; exploring their efforts to reform an industry known for its massive energy use and waste.

programme.title: All There Is With Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Documentary filmmaker Ken Burns has been called "Americas biographer," but in this moving conversation, he reveals how his own history has been shaped by early loss - the death of his mother Lyla when Ken was eleven years old.

programme.title: CNN Heroes
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper and Laura Coates co-host the 19th annual celebration honoring the years Top 5 CNN Heroes and reveal the viewers choice for CNN Hero of the Year.

programme.title: The Whole Story with Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Sara Sidner shares a powerful portrait of a multi-racial Southern family that confronts and explores its painful shared history and comes together in spite of it. United, they consider how they can serve as a blueprint for racial healing.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Christiane speaks with Icelands President Halla Tomasdottir and film director Pamela Hogan about the day 50 years ago when Icelands women went on strike to demand equal treatment, and the recent documentary telling the full story. Also, CNNs former Cairo bureau chief Gayle Young speaks with Christiane about her career and recent memoir, "Update", and Hari Sreenivasan speaks with tech writer Cory Doctorow about his book exploring what he calls the "ensh*ttification" of the internet.

programme.title: All There Is With Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Luke Bryan is one of country musics biggest stars. Hes also faced great loss. In this personal and revealing conversation with Anderson, Luke shares how faith, family, and music have helped him "do what you do to get through."

programme.title: Call to Earth
programme.desc: World-renowned wildlife photographer Chris Fallows leads an inspiring journey from South Africa to Tanzania, highlighting the threats facing some of Africas most wild places and celebrating those racing to save them.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Christiane speaks with Icelands President Halla Tomasdottir and film director Pamela Hogan about the day 50 years ago when Icelands women went on strike to demand equal treatment, and the recent documentary telling the full story. Also, CNNs former Cairo bureau chief Gayle Young speaks with Christiane about her career and recent memoir, "Update", and Hari Sreenivasan speaks with tech writer Cory Doctorow about his book exploring what he calls the "ensh*ttification" of the internet.

programme.title: Early Start with Rahel Solomon
programme.desc: Magazino. Start your day with all the information you need. This hour gives you the stories that will shape the next 24. On the agenda: U.S. politics and global affairs, what to expect in the business world, and key cultural and sporting events.

programme.title: CNN News Central
programme.desc: News. The core hub of the networks best newsgathering operation during the day, bringing stories to viewers in real time, while offering perspective and context to key issues using innovative technology and storytelling tools.

programme.title: CNN News Central
programme.desc: News. The core hub of the networks best newsgathering operation during the day, bringing stories to viewers in real time, while offering perspective and context to key issues using innovative technology and storytelling tools.

programme.title: CNN News Central
programme.desc: News. The core hub of the networks best newsgathering operation during the day, bringing stories to viewers in real time, while offering perspective and context to key issues using innovative technology and storytelling tools.

programme.title: Vital Signs with Dr. Sanjay Gupta
programme.desc: We all know about animals that hibernate., the ones who press slow down or pause on nearly all metabolic functions like heart rate, blood flow, brain waves and body temperature, only to wake up as if nothing happened. Its something humans have never done, but what if they could? And what if the act of hibernation in humans could prolong lives or even save them? Dr. Sanjay Gupta takes a look at the scientists and researchers around the world studying what happens on a molecular level when animals hibernate and how these superpowers could one day be harnessed to fight cancer, help heart attack patients, treat depression, and even go to Mars.

programme.title: The Situation Room
programme.desc: Wolf Blitzer and Pamela Brown are in the command center for breaking news, politics and extraordinary reports from around the world.

programme.title: One World
programme.desc: Zain Asher and Bianna Golodryga cover the top global and national issues of the day.

programme.title: CNN Creators: The Intro
programme.desc: Live from Doha, Qatar, CNN Creators follows a team of digital-native storytellers as they navigate the stories that matter most, with a focus on tech, art, culture, sport, and social trends.

programme.title: CNN Heroes
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper and Laura Coates co-host the 19th annual celebration honoring the years Top 5 CNN Heroes and reveal the viewers choice for CNN Hero of the Year.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Christiane speaks with historian Thant Myint-U about his book "Peacemaker", documenting the life of his grandfather U Thant, who as UN Secretary-General in the 1960s became a pivotal player in resolving wars around the world. Also on the show today: legendary filmmaker Werner Herzog speaks with Christiane about his recent non-fiction book, "The Future of Truth", and Hari Sreenivasan speaks with novelist Arundhati Roy about her memoir, "Mother Mary Comes to Me".

programme.title: Seasons
programme.desc: In a world obsessed with speed, new CNN host Laura Jackson invites us to rediscover the beauty of taking our time. Known for her effortless hosting and passion for creating meaningful moments, Laura believes that true luxury is about stories, craft, and connection.

programme.title: All There Is With Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Luke Bryan is one of country musics biggest stars. Hes also faced great loss. In this personal and revealing conversation with Anderson, Luke shares how faith, family, and music have helped him "do what you do to get through."

programme.title: Global Perspectives
programme.desc: Hosted by Zain Asher, this special half-hour program showcases the best of CNNs inaugural "Global Perspectives: On Africa" event, featuring interviews and session highlights with high profile political and business leaders, innovators and thought-leaders.

programme.title: The Whole Story with Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: The Smithsonian National Zoo is set to reopen its panda exhibit. David Culver covers the arrival of the first giant pandas sent from China to the U.S. in 24 years and examines the history of panda diplomacy.

programme.title: The Whole Story with Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Erica Hill explores the future of Venice, a city threatened by rising sea levels and the more immediate threat of overwhelming tourism. She speaks with locals working to preserve the citys traditions and address climate change.

programme.title: All There Is With Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Luke Bryan is one of country musics biggest stars. Hes also faced great loss. In this personal and revealing conversation with Anderson, Luke shares how faith, family, and music have helped him "do what you do to get through."

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS
programme.desc: Weekly public affairs show hosted by an American journalist, political scientist, and author Fareed Zakaria. The show is broadcasted on CNN every Sunday in many countries of the world. The "GPS" in the shows title stands for "Global Public Square," a reference to the shows focus on international issues and foreign affairs. The guests of the shows one-on-one interviews and roundtable discussions are most prominent figures in the world of global politics, economy and global decision-makers and influencers.

programme.title: The Whole Story with Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: From the hurricane-afflicted Gulf Coast to the fire-ravaged mountains of California, communities are rebuilding in the face of disaster. CNNs Bill Weir explores the lessons learned and how we can adapt to a changing climate.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Christiane speaks with historian Thant Myint-U about his book "Peacemaker", documenting the life of his grandfather U Thant, who as UN Secretary-General in the 1960s became a pivotal player in resolving wars around the world. Also on the show today: legendary filmmaker Werner Herzog speaks with Christiane about his recent non-fiction book, "The Future of Truth", and Hari Sreenivasan speaks with novelist Arundhati Roy about her memoir, "Mother Mary Comes to Me".

programme.title: Blueprint
programme.desc: Many people travel to Mongolia to disconnect, to escape into the vast wilderness and switch off. But for Mongolians, connectivity is everything. The country has 3.5 million people and 5 million active phone numbers. Everywhere you look in the capital city Ulaanbaatar, people are glued to their phones. A vibrant startup scene in the city is driving innovation and diversifying Mongolias economy beyond its mining roots, fueled by a young, ambitious, and entrepreneurial population. A new digital infrastructure is not only reshaping how people travel, live and shop here - but tackling some of the countrys biggest challenges: congestion, pollution and climate change. Innovations first cultivated in the city are taking root in remote corners of the country, where 30% of the population still live nomadic lifestyles. Forget Silicon Valley, this is the Silicon Steppe, where homegrown startups are powering Mongolias digital transformation.

programme.title: Global Perspectives
programme.desc: Hosted by Zain Asher, this special half-hour program showcases the best of CNNs inaugural "Global Perspectives: On Africa" event, featuring interviews and session highlights with high profile political and business leaders, innovators and thought-leaders.

programme.title: POV
programme.desc: POV travels away from well-worn tourist trails to discover the countrys essence through the lens of its people. Meet those who dedicate their lives to safeguarding the culture through art, food, and more, and how these facets co-exist within modern culture today.

programme.title: The Journey Matters
programme.desc: Travel and tourism to the Philippines surpassed pre-pandemic levels in 2024. Visitors now focus on authentic and sustainable experiences that preserve traditions, the environment and support local communities.

programme.title: Amanpour

programme.title: Early Start with Rahel Solomon
programme.desc: Magazino. Start your day with all the information you need. This hour gives you the stories that will shape the next 24. On the agenda: U.S. politics and global affairs, what to expect in the business world, and key cultural and sporting events.

programme.title: CNN This Morning
programme.desc: The latest news and information from around the world. Don Lemon, Poppy Harlow, and Kaitlan Collins host.

programme.title: CNN News Central
programme.desc: News. The core hub of the networks best newsgathering operation during the day, bringing stories to viewers in real time, while offering perspective and context to key issues using innovative technology and storytelling tools.

programme.title: The Situation Room

programme.title: Elite Escapes
programme.desc: The once sleepy fishing village of Bodrum, home to some of the most exclusive hotels in Turkey, has become an internationally renowned destination for the rich, famous and glamorous.

programme.title: Inside Politics
programme.desc: Inside Politics is a political talk show, broadcast on CNN and anchored by CNN Chief National Correspondent John King. It features the most important political stories presented by a panel of well-sourced reporters. John King is an experienced reporter who covers the White House, Congress and the campaign trail, and interviews presidents, politicians and voters.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Christiane sits down with the BBCs chief international correspondent Lyse Doucet to talk about Afghanistan and her new book, "The Finest Hotel in Kabul". Matthew McConaughey also joins the program to discuss his faith and how it has influenced his life, while Harvard sociologist Christina Cross speaks with Michel Martin about the impact of single-parent households, as explored in her recent book, "Inherited Inequality".

programme.title: The Lead with Jake Tapper
programme.desc: News, politics and current affairs programme hosted by the award-winning, American journalist and author, Jake Tapper. Jake Tapper is the chief Washington correspondent for CNN and he will share his knowledge and insight into politics as well as covering a variety of other topics. This programme discusses a range of stories from topical events including national news, economics/finance, sports, health, technology and world affairs. The Lead with Jake Tapper has won a number of awards and accolades including three National Headliner Awards. Outside his work on television, Tapper has written for The New Yorker, The Washington Post and the Los Angeles Times as well as publishing his first novel, a political thriller.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: The Source with Kaitlan Collins

programme.title: Truck Dynasty
programme.desc: A one-of-a-kind Land Rover Defender build brings in big money, so Joe starts work on his passion project: the Boat Truck, a truly amphibious Jeep.

programme.title: Fast n Loud
programme.desc: Fast N Loud is a reality styled TV show featuring Richard Rawlings and his crew from the Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage. For most people old rusty cars in garages or open spaces are nothing but junk, but not for these guys. For them it is a perfect chance to reconstruct such vehicles and make some money. The old run-down cars are restored flawlessly and are able to run steadily for the next 10 years for sure. Richard and his crew work really hard to make a name for themselves and have become a huge success thanks to their enormous talents.

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral
programme.desc: Todays world is watched by billions of cameras; CCTV, dash cams, home surveillance and mobile phones capture crazy incidents every day. This documentary series examines clips that exploded on the internet, the videos that amassed millions of views to become viral. Break-ins, car chases, angry confrontations; Crimes Gone Viral has it all. And not satisfied with just the clips, the show delves deeper into the story behind each video with interviews and insider information.
